      public boolean registerUser(String email, String username, String firstPassword, String secondPassword) throws EmailException, PasswordException, PasswordMismatchException, UsernameException, UserAlreadyExistsException
      Register
      Parameters:
      email - Correo electronico
      username - Nombre de usuario
      firstPassword - Primera contraseña
      secondPassword - Segunda contraseña
      Returns:
      True if the user is registered
      Throws:
      EmailException - exception for email
      PasswordException - exception for password
      PasswordMismatchException - exception for password mismatch
      UsernameException - exception for username
      UserAlreadyExistsException - exception for user already exists
